name: Captain'sLog
0:
”Alexa, open Captain's Log”
”Alexa, Ask Captain's Log To List All Activities”
”Alexa, Ask Captain's Log To Start Activity WORK”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: captain's log
Developer Terms of Use
des: Know how you spend your time by telling Alexa when you start and end and activity. Time spent will be accumulated over a period of time. Simply tell it your name, or if you prefer she will call you Captain. Load activities that come with the Skill or create your own. You can also assign a per hour rate to the activity. Great for keeping track of projects. To start simply say Alexa, open Captain's Log. To get a list of activities say, Alexa, Ask Captain's Log to List All Activities. Detailed Instructions. Thank you and make good use of your time!
